text: Niŵaiche najo kansu jakwe jili jepakasye myasi jaunami. Jwalakwe (Yaakubu ndema jajwajiweni kansu kuti jangapapuka) jwatite: “(Ngwamba!) Nambo kuti mitima jenu jinsalalichisye chitendo (chamuntesile n’jenujo). Basi (chatindende une) nikupilila kwambone, soni Allah ni Nkuŵendedwa chikamuchisyo pa yankutangayi.”
